messages.content:
Validate W-2 document data against loan entity.

Loan ID: 387596ee-7090-47ca-8385-206e22c9c9da
W-2 Attachment ID: d78186cc-a8a2-454f-beaf-19f0e6c3aa8c

Your task:
1. Get loan entity with borrower name and employment history
2. Download and extract W-2 data (employee name, employer name, tax year)
3. Compare W-2 data with loan entity to validate consistency
4. Report if employee matches borrower and if employer is in employment history (current or previous)

Create a plan and execute the validation.
